Address.label: Address
Address.value: 900 JEFFERSON AVENUE, REDWOOD CITY, California, 94063, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Box is a cloud-based content services platform that provides cloud-based storage and workflow collaboration services for enterprise customers. The firm was founded in 2005 as a file sync and sharing provider. More recently, however, the company has focused on bolstering its product portfolio by adding tools such as governance and e-signature that enhance workflow management and collaboration.
